alert.note: Alert for Burney Basin, Eastern Shasta County; Motherlode; Mountains Southwestern Shasta County to Western Colusa County; Northeast Foothills, Sacramento Valley; Shasta Lake Area, Northern Shasta County (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 27 at 2:03AM PST until March 01 at 4:00AM PST by NWS Sacramento
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 AM PST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 3 feet. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...Shasta Lake Area / Northern Shasta County, Burney Basin / Eastern Shasta County, Mountains Southwestern Shasta County to Western Colusa County and Northeast Foothills/Sacramento Valley. * WHEN...Until 4 AM PST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Gusty winds and snow could bring down tree branches leading to power outages. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow levels 1000 to 2000 feet.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Burney Basin, Eastern Shasta County; Motherlode; Mountains Southwestern Shasta County to Western Colusa County; Northeast Foothills, Sacramento Valley; Shasta Lake Area, Northern Shasta County
